fields.name: Spring Rolls (2)
fields.description: Crispy golden rolls filled with vegetables and glass noodles, served with sweet chilli dipping sauce.
fields.description_en: Crispy golden rolls filled with vegetables and glass noodles, served with sweet chilli dipping sauce.

fields.name: Prawn Toast (4)
fields.description: Sesame-topped prawn toast, deep-fried to a perfect golden crunch.
fields.description_en: Sesame-topped prawn toast, deep-fried to a perfect golden crunch.

fields.name: Crispy Wontons (6)
fields.description: Deep-fried pork and prawn wontons, light and crunchy with a savoury filling.
fields.description_en: Deep-fried pork and prawn wontons, light and crunchy with a savoury filling.

fields.name: Sesame Prawn on Toast (4)
fields.description: Minced king prawn on white toast, coated in sesame seeds and deep fried.
fields.description_en: Minced king prawn on white toast, coated in sesame seeds and deep fried.

fields.name: Salt & Pepper Squid
fields.description: Crispy battered squid tossed with fresh chilli, salt and pepper seasoning.
fields.description_en: Crispy battered squid tossed with fresh chilli, salt and pepper seasoning.

fields.name: Hot & Sour Soup
fields.description: A classic Chinese soup with tofu, bamboo shoots and egg in a tangy pepper broth.
fields.description_en: A classic Chinese soup with tofu, bamboo shoots and egg in a tangy pepper broth.

fields.name: Wonton Soup
fields.description: Pork and prawn wontons served in a light, clear chicken broth with spring onions.
fields.description_en: Pork and prawn wontons served in a light, clear chicken broth with spring onions.

fields.name: Sweet Corn & Chicken Soup
fields.description: Thick, comforting creamed sweetcorn soup with shredded chicken and egg swirl.
fields.description_en: Thick, comforting creamed sweetcorn soup with shredded chicken and egg swirl.

fields.name: Half Aromatic Crispy Duck
fields.description: Half crispy aromatic duck served with 12 pancakes, cucumber, spring onions and hoisin sauce.
fields.description_en: Half crispy aromatic duck served with 12 pancakes, cucumber, spring onions and hoisin sauce.

fields.name: Whole Aromatic Crispy Duck
fields.description: Whole crispy aromatic duck served with 24 pancakes, cucumber, spring onions and hoisin sauce.
fields.description_en: Whole crispy aromatic duck served with 24 pancakes, cucumber, spring onions and hoisin sauce.

fields.name: Duck in Black Bean Sauce
fields.description: Tender sliced duck stir-fried with peppers and onions in a rich black bean sauce.
fields.description_en: Tender sliced duck stir-fried with peppers and onions in a rich black bean sauce.

fields.name: Kung Po Chicken
fields.description: Diced chicken wok-fried with dried chillies, peanuts and cashews in a spicy kung po sauce.
fields.description_en: Diced chicken wok-fried with dried chillies, peanuts and cashews in a spicy kung po sauce.

fields.name: Chicken in Black Bean Sauce
fields.description: Tender chicken breast strips stir-fried with green peppers in a savoury black bean sauce.
fields.description_en: Tender chicken breast strips stir-fried with green peppers in a savoury black bean sauce.

fields.name: Sweet & Sour Chicken (Hong Kong Style)
fields.description: Crispy battered chicken in a vibrant sweet and sour sauce with peppers and pineapple.
fields.description_en: Crispy battered chicken in a vibrant sweet and sour sauce with peppers and pineapple.

fields.name: Chicken Chow Mein
fields.description: Egg noodles wok-fried with chicken, beansprouts, peppers and spring onions.
fields.description_en: Egg noodles wok-fried with chicken, beansprouts, peppers and spring onions.

fields.name: Lemon Chicken
fields.description: Crispy battered chicken fillet smothered in a tangy, zingy lemon sauce.
fields.description_en: Crispy battered chicken fillet smothered in a tangy, zingy lemon sauce.

fields.name: Beef in Oyster Sauce
fields.description: Tender sliced beef wok-fried with pak choi and mushrooms in a rich oyster sauce.
fields.description_en: Tender sliced beef wok-fried with pak choi and mushrooms in a rich oyster sauce.

fields.name: Crispy Shredded Beef
fields.description: Crispy deep-fried shredded beef tossed in a sweet chilli sauce with carrot strips.
fields.description_en: Crispy deep-fried shredded beef tossed in a sweet chilli sauce with carrot strips.

fields.name: Lamb in Black Bean Sauce
fields.description: Tender sliced lamb stir-fried with green peppers and onions in a classic black bean sauce.
fields.description_en: Tender sliced lamb stir-fried with green peppers and onions in a classic black bean sauce.

fields.name: Sweet & Sour Pork (Hong Kong Style)
fields.description: Classic crispy pork with pineapple, peppers and onions in a bright sweet and sour sauce.
fields.description_en: Classic crispy pork with pineapple, peppers and onions in a bright sweet and sour sauce.

fields.name: Char Siu Pork
fields.description: Cantonese BBQ pork, marinated and roasted until sticky and caramelised, served with steamed rice.
fields.description_en: Cantonese BBQ pork, marinated and roasted until sticky and caramelised, served with steamed rice.

fields.name: Pork with Mushrooms
fields.description: Tender pork strips wok-fried with shiitake and button mushrooms in a savoury brown sauce.
fields.description_en: Tender pork strips wok-fried with shiitake and button mushrooms in a savoury brown sauce.

fields.name: King Prawn in Black Bean Sauce

fields.name: Sweet & Sour King Prawns

fields.description_en: Silken and firm tofu wok-fried with green peppers and spring onions in black bean sauce.

fields.description_en: Egg noodles wok-fried with king prawns, beansprouts, peppers and a splash of soy sauce.
